reviews.review:
[h1]Лабораторная работа по физике 11 класс[/h1]

Ну что-ж, можно долго награждать эту игру титулами [b]ИГРАВЕКАЧЁРТВОЗЬМИДВЕНАДЦАТЬИЗДЕСЯТИСТОБАЛЛОВНАМЕТАКРИТИКЕ[/b]
Но тут этого не будет. Игра, несомненно, хорошая, но размусоливать то, что вы можете прочитать выше(или ниже))00 ) я не хочу. Проходил я её долго, заблудившись на эпизоде обработки отходов(ага, я серьёзно). Вернувшись сегодня, я прошёл ей залпом. Игра имеет хороший сюжет и ураганный [strike]кроссфайр[/strike] мультиплеер.

[b]Сюжет[/b]

Игра встречает нас увлекательной поездкой в поезде [spoiler] Минута молчания тем людям, которые включали одиночную игру в компьютерном клубе. [/spoiler], где находится  [strike]ученик одиннадцатого класса[/strike] некий учёный Гордон Фримен. По прибытию в комплекс, главный герой получает HEV костюм для тестирования кристаллов из Зена/Ксена. Эксперимент увенчался неудачей, а если конкретнее, телепортацией фауны Зена/Ксена на землю. Далее спойлеры[spoiler]мне лень писать дальше[/spoiler].

[b]Мультиплеер[/b]

[spoiler]Минута молчания тем, кого избивали в компьютерном клубе за активацию авиаудара на кроссфайре[/spoiler]

Тут выбор невелик - киллбокс в разных вариациях или кроссфайр. На одном сидят люди, которые с рождения стреляли из Тау-9 и баннихопперы, а на втором... тоже самое. Мультиплеер квейка, ей богу.
Я, конечно, преувеличиваю, но всё же советую играть со знакомыми, иначе ваш игровой табурет превратится в уголь(если, конечно, вы не одни из таких киберкотлет)

[b]Вердикт[/b]

Однозначно да. Игра стоит 250 рублей, а то и ~50 по скидкам. Ознакомится должен каждый. 3/3.
Oh man. Now I understand why this game was so revolutionary when it came out.

一切的开始，不多说

Eski ama güzel bir oyun. Yeni oyunlara fark atacak kadar iyi diye bilirim. Canınız sıkıldıysa veya oynadığınız oyundan sıkıldıysanız, açın ve bunu oynayın. Ve birde bu oyunun serisi var hl2 ona da bakın derim...
Поправили бы баги к 2019 году.

Positives:
- 15+ hours on Medium difficulty
- Visuals: the aliens, Black Mesa facility and other areas I won't spoil 
- Huge variety of enemies
- Variety of weapons and approaches to killing enemies
- Really satisfying figuring out enemy weaknesses and how to get past sections without an objective marker showing the way
- The atmosphere! 
- Navigating the world and taking in all the different environments

Negatives:
- Pushing boxes can be a pain in the ass
- Security guard followers end up shooting you more than the enemies
- Music was a bit meh, mostly 90s drum n bass that you'd hear in a Lethal Weapon sequel

All and all, this game is actually pretty good, especially if you get it on sale for less than a buck. I didn't play it as a kid, so I'm not blinded by nostalgia. My breakdown:

Pros:
-Overall good level design
-Fun Variety of Weapons
-Good sense of achievement without forcing you to go back to a checkpoint constantly like Dark Souls
-The Black Mesa facility has great atmosphere 

Cons:
-Buggy. It even bugged out in the credits...
-90% of the levels are good...the other 10% are complete garbage (Surface Tension and On Rails)
-Story: It's forgivable, but not good
-Some of the platforming is obnoxious

Half-Life (1998)
Serinin bu ilk oyununa bir tren yolculu ile başlıyoruz. Bu yolculuk sırasında ve oyunun devamında Gordon Freeman adlı bir bilmadamını canlandırdığımızı, bu kişinin Black Mesa Araştırma Tesisi‘nde çalıştığını, tesiste ulaşımı sağlamak amacı ile bir raylı sistemin düzenlendiğini ve Freeman’ın yetişmesi gereken bir deneye yarım saat geç kaldığını öğreniyoruz.

G-Man isimli gizemli karakter, özel olarak seçilmiş bir kristali Xen gezegenine giden insan araştırma grubuna teslim eder. Bu kristal yeterince incelenemeden deneyde kullanılır ve dünya ile Xen gezegeni arasında bir portal açılır. Gordon Freeman birkaç kez dünya ile Xen arasında ışınlanmış, Xen gezegenindeki yaratıkların dünyaya ışınlandığını görmüştür. Oyun, yanlış giden bu deneyin ardından Dr. Freeman’ın içinde bulunduğu Black Mesa’dan kaçışını konu almaktadır. Elimizde levye, başlıyoruz vurup kırmaya. Bu kaçış sırasında tesisin büyük bir yıkıma uğradığını, birçok çalışanın yaralandığını, öldüğünü ya da headcrab gibi yaratıklar tarafından zombiye dönüştüklerine şahit olmaktayız.

BlackOps timi bu tesiste yaşananların dışarı sızmaması için tesisteki herkesin öldürülmesi üzere emir alır. Freeman giydiği HEV kıyafetinin de avantajıyla hem BlackOps timinin üstesinden gelir hem de Xen gezegeninin lideri olan Nihilianth‘ı öldürür. Freeman’ın bu yetenekleri G-Man’in dikkatini çeker ve oyunun sonunda G-Man, Gordon Freeman’ı bir seçime zorlar. Freeman ya G-Man için çalışmayı kabul edecektir ya da silahsız bir şekilde tüm yaratıkların arasına itilerek ölüme terkedilecektir. Freeman çalışmayı kabul eder ve G-Man tarafından Half Life 2 oyununun başına kadar uyutulur.

Black Mesa faciasından az sayıda insan kurtulmuştur. Wallace Breen (Black Mesa Başkanı ve aynı zamanda ikinci oyunun başında City 17’nin başındaki isim), Güvenlik Görevlisi Barney Calhoun, Dr. Issac Kleiner, Dr. Arne Magnusson, Dr. Eli Vance ve kızı Alyx Vance bu isimler arasındadır.
очень крутая игра, жалко что не запусткается!

Named Game of the Year by over 50 publications, Valve's debut title blends action and adventure with award-winning technology to create a frighteningly realistic world where players must think to survive. Also includes an exciting multiplayer mode that allows you to play against friends and enemies around the world.

I first bought this game sometime ago, downloaded it to never look upon it once again. Then one day found the inspiration to play the game. Upon first booting it up I was super intrigued considering I've never played a old school shooter. The game starts to really pick up on action when you get your first pistol and then from there the game keeps getting harder and harder to the point where I had to use a guide. Which isn't a bad thing, it's a different thing lol. Overall I have to say this game is awesome and will be playing it over on the source version and playing all the expansions. Do recommend this game for old school shooter fans and low spec gamers.

[h1][b]Ученый-физик пускается во все тяжкие.[/b][/h1]

[b][i]Внимание! Данный обзор - лишь мнение автора, которое он вам не навязывает! Вы можете остаться при своем. Если с чем-то не согласны - пишите коментарии, мы обсудим! [/i][/b]

[h1]✎ Предисловие:[/h1]
Я прекрасно понимаю, что в 2018 году писать отзыв на игру вышедшую в далеком 1998, как минимум поздно, но все же я сделаю его из чувства глубокой ностальгии и благодарности разработчику. Обзор чисто субъективный и описывать я буду те эмоции, которые игра вызывает исключительно в настоящее время т.к в прошлом эта игра являла собой эталон. Я прекрасно знаю, что существует фанатская модификация на новом движке - «Black Mesa», но там еще нет мира Ксен (Зен) и поэтому я решил перепройти классику.

[h1]✔ Достоинства:[/h1]
➜ Сюжет. Сценаристы потрудились на славу и мы получили прекрасную историю, которая вылилась в очень интересный франчайз со своим уникальным лором. Даже есть альтернативная концовка.
➜ Локации. Каждая из них пестрит своим антуражем, имеет свое наполнение, которое гармонично вписывается в общую тематику игры.
➜ Арсенал. Для истребления недругов разработчик преподносит приличное количество оружия. Вы определенно найдете себе что-то по вкусу! От обычного огнестрела до плазменных пушек или инопланетных орудий, стреляющих самонаводящимися насекомыми. Стоит упомянуть и про монтировку с которой наш герой не будет расставаться на протяжении и остальных частей.
➜ Звуки и музыка. Все довольно неплохо и прекрасно подходит к происходящему на экране.
➜ Геймплей. Динамичный и очень активный! Огромное количество перестрелок и беготни не заставит вас скучать! А лаборатории, которые превратились в своеобразные ловушки, заставят вас попотеть и улучшить координацию движений.
➜ Противники. Главная изюминка игры – инопланетяне, а их в игре с избытком! Барнаклы, Буллскиды, Вортигонты, Гранты, Хаундаи, Тентакли и конечно же они – Хедкрабы! Так же присутствуют и другие, но их слишком много, чтобы перечислять. Каждый из них опасен по-своему и выполнен качественно и интересно. Расправляться с ними – сплошное удовольствие! 
➜ Неплохой ИИ. Он даст фору многим современным аналогам. Враги умеют объеденяться и действовать сообща, активно пользоваться укрытиями и метко швырять гранаты.
➜ Живой мультиплеер. В данный момент играть приходится не на самом мощном ПК (а откровенно говоря, почти что на микроволновке. Только дисплей побольше) и как же я был рад увидеть кучу серверов с людьми! И сразу нахлынуло чувство огромной ностальгии по тому огромному количеству часов, которые проводились в «игровухах».. Как же это было прекрасно!

[h1]✘ Недостатки:[/h1]
Незначительные и выглядят как придирка, но все же я для себя их нашел. 

➜ Застрявание в текстурах. Довольно часто нам приходится перемещаться в трубах и Гордон натыкается на невидимый объект, а если еще и произошла загрузка локации, то шанс застрять в текстуре = 95%. Лечится «быстрой загрузкой», ну или придется очень медленно и ровно идти. Во время прыжков на некоторые объекты, наш протагонист все так же застревает (в каньоне очень сильно раздражало).
➜ Немой протагонист. Вокруг царит такой хаос а он молчит… Хотя это и придает Гордону некий шарм, но он быстро улетучивается.
➜ Физика стрельбы. Нет даже имитации отдачи.
➜ Запутанность локаций. Иногда не совсем очевидно куда идти дальше. Особенно в междумирье - с трудом заметил эту щель в астероиде (она сливается с общей текстурой) и в начале игры был момент, где нужно пододвинуть ящик к обломкам потолка.

[h1]⚠ Дополнения.[/h1]
В то время о такой вещи как «dlc», еще не задумывались, поэтому выходили маленькие ответвления - «Blue shift» и «Opposing Force» Первое расскажет об охраннике Черной Мезы – Барни Калхауне, который тоже пройдет тернистый путь, хотя и не такой как Гордон. А второе даст нам примерить на себя роль солдата и снова вернуться в комплекс лабораторий, начав глобальную зачистку объекта. Лично мне дополнения показались скучнее оригинала, хотя сюжетом они тесно с ним пересекаются. Можно увидеть Гордона и даже попытаться ему помешать! В дополнениях нам представят несколько новых видов противников и так же немного изменят арсенал. 

[h1]➥ Итог.[/h1]
«Half life» – игра¬-легенда, породившая собой огромное число фанатов по всему миру. Позже именно на ее движке возникнет фанатская модификация, которая впоследствии станет самостоятельной игрой – Counter Strike. Эталон своего времени, к которому вполне приятно прикоснуться и сейчас. Если же вас все же смущает возраст продукта – то рекомендую приобрести «Black Mesa» и ждать когда в нее наконец-то добавят финальные локации.
8 хедкрабов из 10 ( ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ )

Just Buy It !

This game has really changed the face of gaming as a whole, and it would be hard to articulate my unending love for this game. 

In this game, you play as an MIT graduate named Gordon Freeman, with a Ph,D in theoretical physics. Already you can tell this game is different. Rather then being set in a maze with a bunch of enemies and a gun like other games at that time, you are set in a calm, pleasant train ride. A nice change of pace at the time, but soon, it wouldn't be such a nice time. 

After you're let into the test chamber by a security guard at Black Mesa Research Facility, you are given the task of slotting an unknown crystal into a mysterious machine, and the motives of this experiment were unknown. 

Then it goes down, and you are given your first weapon. I'd tell more, but you'd just have to play the game. 

You were more than just a bad-ass killing machine with a shotgun. You were Gordon, and your motivation was to escape Black Mesa and survive. 

Words cannot describe how much this game means to me, but you would have to take my word for it. If you've been considering buying this, then please. Do purchase it. You will not be disappointed.

Not to mention the countless mods and games this has spawned. Counter Strike, Day of Defeat, Team Fortress: Classic, and so on. 

This game is revolutionary. A masterpiece. And the sequel, despite taking 6 years to complete, reaches the bar it's prequel put up, and even exceeds it in some aspects.

I recommend this game to any gamer of any genre. There's always something to love here. Whether you agree with me that it's the greatest game ever made, we can at least agree it was PHENOMENAL. 

Hands down the greatest game ever made, in my opinion. I put my heart and soul into this review. I hope you found it helpful.
One of my favorite games, would recommend this to anyone who enjoys sci-fi and alien games with a great story and series.

[h1] TLDR: Play Half-Life: Source, it's better in many ways. [/h1]


Theres nothing really wrong with this version of Half-Life, it's just not as good as the Source Engine port. Stuff like Graphics, sound, and physics are obviously better in the source engine version, but I also noticed a few things:

- Some weapons seem less effective

Particularly the shotgun; it feels like it does less damage or something. Whenever I used it against headcrabs I would often miss or have to use 2 shells to kill them despite being close and having the crosshair dead center on them. 

- AI is kinda glitchy

I noticed multiple times that the AI of enemies and NPCs sometimes have trouble with moving around. One instance in particular was when I had a Guard following me, and I tried to lead him through a pair of double doors (which were both open). After I ran through, the gaurd's AI decided to close the door in front of him, and then just keep running into the door.

- The Flashlight is GARBAGE

The flashlight in this game doesnt work like most games. Its hard to describe but in some areas it's just horribly ineffective. The best example I can give is when you're inside an air vent or other small, confined spaces with little to no light. The flashlight will only illuminate a very small area, making it very difficult to spot headcrabs in the vent ahead of you.


None of this is really game breaking, or ruins the experience, but I cant help but feel this version is inferior after putting dozens of hours into the source engine version. For this reason I do not recommend it. Play Half-Life: Source.

Everyone that isnt used to these type of game (Gold source and such) it would be a very... well shocking experiance.
And I say GOLD SOURCE which are after the quake days, not old SOURCE which is powering Half life 2 and portal 1.
must say someone, if he only played call of duty and battle field and all that would also be in shock playing early source games of 2000, espacially because of the foreigen not in your face level design and the lack of visible tutorials.
But still theyll quicklly get the idea because its not too different from what they are used to.

Half life 1 is different from anything Ive played, Doom, half life 2, portal 2 its just not it.
The level design isnt basced firstly... on the player progress.
its like they tryied to make it more belivable and on the played disadvantage!
I mean in half life 2 theres a lot of levels thatt are at player disadvantage, But not like this.
This world of black mesa is lethal, it wasnt made for the player and youll need perfact reactions to each scenario.

Thats why first playthrough is absalotly absolutely HORRENDOUS... its painful, it really is and Im speaking about first playthrough which Ive check how to progress only less then 3 times.
and its not painful to rage quite alright. its not unplayable that you cant do a thing its just to progress youll need to put a lot from yourself and really use your brain. and at the same try to not get killed by hit scanning enemies, in relatively open maps (for hit scanning enemies).
But when you do progress you just feel good. I dont know how to explain this its just such a challenge to go on it feels good when you did it yourself, tho still getting mad on the game that they could just make it less of a pain in the ass like ids did.
I think the thing I can compare it the most is if you played a build game, with platforms when the floor is ice, enemies are spawing, and they are at a place of advantage over you, ho yeah and you have to reaload unaccurate weapons.

and I must say in second playthrough the weapons and the shootings is still not the best.
platforming is not fun at all
and the floor is still ice
But if progression was a challenge motivation at first playthrough
at second playthrough the progression is just pure entertainment motivation
the game just becomes much easier.
enemies well still not super fun to shoot you know better what youre doing and game flow becomes really smooth.
I really concider never playing it again after Ive completed Xen 
But I was bored and you know if you know where to go, what to do, wheres the enemies, how to break line of site and all that.
Half life 1 is pretty entertaining game!
The story (the way it was told) is really interesting especially when youve played all the other games and the enviornments are (maybe out dated) kinda nice to look at.

the high light is not the shooting in this, but the pure progression is THE high light of half life one and its all what it is made of.
on first playthrough: 5/10 tho its a challenge I took for myself
second playthrough; 7/10 not that bad really!
I dont recommand you to start from this game, what I did that I want back in time from portal 2 to 1 to half life 2 to this.
everyone that concider himself half life 2 and portals games and READY TO TAKE THE CHALLENGE, go for it man! if I did it you can.
for everyone that dont know shit about it, just dont. it would be such a hard shock, you will probably faint.

240/10

Лично единственная проблема с которой я столкнулся при запуске, это  чёрный экран.Я пытался это  исправить переустановками но  потом я пошёл в интернет и нашел что в параметрах запуска нужно прописать одну команду, вы спросите ну всё или что то еще было, я отвечу да было.Картинка стала нормальной но когда я захотел поменять разрешение я слуйчайно поставил 800-600,я даже не смог  обратно изменить разрешение и забросил это дело на месяц.Потом мой друг попросил меня купить cs 1.6,я уже не помню с чем у меня была проблема но когда я поработал с файлами игры у меня все заработало,и я решил проверить а вдруг  халва тоже заработала,и да она заработала.Что хочу добавить ну скажу только халва=великая игра.

《半条命》不愧是当年震撼整个业界的作品，放在今天来看也依旧十分优秀，以下附上个人对这款游戏优缺点的看法以及一些游玩时的心得。

[b]优点：[/b]
1.[i]流程很连贯，沉浸体验非常好。[/i]
虽然是98年的游戏，剧情方面不能和现在的游戏比（剧透警告：[spoiler]黑山基地发生事故，外星人通过传送装置来到地球，玩家在里面扮演一名科学家：戈登弗里曼，玩家要做的就是在外星人和政府派来灭口的特战队员的围攻中杀出重围，最后跑去外星人老家打爆他们老大[/spoiler]），但是npc与你的互动，以及一些镜头的运用，会令玩家很自然的代入到自己的角色中。还有一点就是，当玩家去到另一个地图需要加载时，是没有跳转到一个读取画面的，配合现代电脑的读写速度，可以伪造一种“无缝连接”的感觉，98年的作品能有这种设计思路真的是很超前了。
2.[i]优秀的地图和关卡设计，这个可以说是这款游戏最大的优点。[/i]
首先是地图，风格很鲜明，重复感不高，而且设计得很巧妙，黑魂中那种“开捷径”的设计随处可见。其次是关卡，种类很多，解谜很有意思，有些看似异想天开的想法，却真的能实施起来（例如跳魔鬼鱼背上）。
3.[i]射击手感还算优秀，有辅助瞄准。[/i]
4.[i]有中文语音。[/i]
这个算是优点也算缺点，有中文配音是好事，不过配音质量不太好，有些关键的地方反而听不清，有字幕就更好了。（第一次碰到喷火怪，警卫叽叽喳喳的不知道在说啥，搞得我一度不知道接下来干嘛）

[b]接下来是不足的地方：[/b]
1.[i]太晕了！！！[/i]
这是这个游戏最致命的地方，我是很多次被这个东西搞得想放弃，而且我通关后真的就不想再打开游戏了。[b]解决办法是调fov，或者在设定里调窗口化→最大化来游玩[/b]，fov我试了不同的方式但是没有起效所以用后者了。所以如果是本来就晕fps的玩家要慎重考虑入不入。
2.[i]脚底抹油的问题。[/i]
之前看到《半条命：起源》里的评测说起源里脚底抹油问题很严重，要买买原版，然后买了原版发现这个问题也存在啊。（或许没那么严重？）
3.[i]光污染严重。[/i]
一定要在光线充足的地方玩这款游戏，这里面的闪光特效很简单，就是整个屏幕闪，还有那荧光绿的废弃污水池，看久了分分钟瞎掉。

[b]最后和大家分享我的一些心得：[/b]
1.[i]勤存档、存多档、还有不要乱存档。[/i]
虽然有自动存档，但是有的时候不太合理，我就试过剩1、2滴血的时候自动存了档然后去干对面大军，最后被迫无伤的经历。（实在不行可以开控制台）
2.[i]熟悉一些基本操作。[/i]
看到有其他评测说强退闪退的，可以试试切换为英语输入法。
有些地方跳不上去可以试试跳蹲，顾名思义跳起来的时候按蹲。
解迷的时候多开动脑洞，推箱子当跳板跳到更高的地方是常用手段。
脚底抹油的话，走钢丝可以按“shift”行走，跳平台落地的时候蹲下就不会乱滑了。
3[i]关于武器。（倒数第二个难度为准）[/i]
撬棍[spoiler]物理学圣剑[/spoiler]在节省子弹的时候可以用来敲箱子搜刮物资，水下与怪物搏斗。
左轮手枪自瞄精准度很高，伤害大，特战队员1下、女刺客2下、弗蒂冈人1下，需要勤换子弹。
MP5冲锋枪，榴弹比子弹强。
十字弩同样非常厉害，除了大型敌人都是1下，还能放大倍数，水下也能用，不发出声音，能够暗杀，缺点是慢。
辐射枪没有辅助瞄准，但是射速快，能把敌人打出硬直。
炸弹类的武器就手雷和炸药包比较好用。

Half-Life 1 really hasn't aged well in the slightest. Hard mode is a grind, the enemies are a chore to get through, the weapons feel weak and pathetic, if it wasn't for this being a landmark in the FPS genre and it always being incredibly cheap stand alone or in a bundle I would tell you to stay very well clear. 

As it stands, only play it if you're curious or got it in a bundle.

It hasn't aged particularly well, but it's still good for about 10-15 hours of gameplay, per playthrough.
If you want a more modern alternative, try "Black Mesa", the community remake.

11/10, this is how Valve was born

This game despite being old, is a good game. It is fun and if you don't mind graphics that are dated, but more than good enough so that you can tell what you are doing and also not rip your eyes out. So for someone that never played it when it came out, I think it is a good game, and I can see how it was revolutionary in its time.

Good morning and welcome to the Black Mesa Transit System. This automated train is provided for the security and convenience of the Black Mesa Research Facility personnel. The time is 08:47 AM. Current topside temperature is 93 degrees, with an estimated high of one hundred and five. The Black Mesa compound is maintained at a pleasant 68 degrees at all times. This train is inbound from Level 3 Dormitories to Sector C Test Labs and Control Facilities. If your intended destination is a high-security area beyond Sector C, you will need to return to the Central Transit Hub in Area 9 and board a high security train. If you have not yet submitted your identity to the retinal clearance system, you must report to Black Mesa Personnel for processing before you will be permitted into the high security branch of the transit system. Due to the high toxicity of material routinely handled in the Black Mesa compound, no smoking, eating, or drinking are permitted within the Black Mesa Transit System. Please keep your limbs inside the train at all times. Do not attempt to open the doors until the train has come to a complete halt at the station platform. In the event of an emergency, passengers are to remain seated and await further instruction. If it is necessary to exit the train, disabled personnel should be evacuated first. Please stay away from electrified rails, and proceed to an emergency station until assistance arrives. A reminder that the Black Mesa Hazard Course decathlon will commence this evening at nineteen hundred hours in the Level 3 Facility. The semifinals for high-security personnel will be announced in a separate Secure Access transmission. Remember, more lives than your own may depend on your fitness. Do you have a friend or relative who would make a valuable addition to the Black Mesa team? Immediate openings are available in the areas of Materials Handling and Low-Clearance Security. Please contact Black Mesa Personnel for further information. If you have an associate with a background in the areas of theoretical physics, biotechnology or other high tech disciplines, please contact our Civilian Recruitment Division. The Black Mesa Research Facility is an equal opportunity employer. A reminder to all Black Mesa Personnel: Regular radiation and biohazard screenings are a requirement of continued employment in the Black Mesa Research Facility. Missing a scheduled urinalysis or radiation check-up is grounds for immediate termination. If you feel you have been exposed to radioactive or other hazardous materials in the course of your duties, contact your Radiation Safety Officer immediately. Work safe, work smart. Your future depends on it. Now arriving at Sector C Test Labs and Control Facilities. Please stand back from the automated door and wait for the security officer to verify your identity. Before exiting the train, be sure to check your area for personal belongings. Thank you and have a very safe and productive day.

I've always heard amazing things about this game and I decided to give it a shot and I was super excited to give it a try and see what this legendary game had to offer. I knew it would have some issues since it is an older game but man the amount of game breaking bugs i experienced were mind numbing. had to revert to very old saves just to give it a shot, and in between those bugs were just boring as hell game play. I understand that it was revolutionary when it was released, but man it does not hold up at all. do not recommend

超級老的第一人稱射擊遊戲，缺點大概如下：
[olist]
[*]美術風格太老舊（但人家就20世紀的遊戲，不然要怎樣xD）
[*]某些章節容易遇到閃退的問題，但過了那段後就還好
[*]有些部分的過關提示偏少，沒仔細摸索的話容易卡關
[/olist]
除此之外，真的是很經典的老遊戲
特賣時甚至不到一瓶飲料的超級銅板價，卻夠你玩10幾個小時
不排斥老遊戲的人值得一試xD
老游戏的兼容太差辣，经常闪退，有训练模式练习操作，还有任务模式，就是打剧情，或者像CS一样创建服务器选地图打，反正跟CS很类似，只是半条命可以打怪，然后现在有中文配音了，还蛮标准。以后如果有幸用到XP系统的电脑我一定再玩一下这些老游戏。
